name: Lost Tera || Scrolling Platformer
description:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Avoid enemies and spikes!!
Collect fruits and get powerups from the shop!!!
You can also swim =)
Press Z to use the parachute
Press X to use speed boost!
Jump boost allows you to jump higher!
Immortality makes you immortal, but you can still die if you fall into the void
R to reset if something glitches
